news.title: Shaw University Launches New Data Science Lab
news.content: Shaw University has launched a new state-of-the-art data science lab to enhance student research and education in the field of data science.
news.author: Sarah Mitchell

news.title: Shaw University Hosts AI Symposium
news.content: Shaw University recently hosted an AI symposium where industry experts and academics discussed the latest advances in artificial intelligence.
news.author: John Smith

news.title: Computer Science Department Receives Major Grant
news.content: The Computer Science department at Shaw University has received a major grant to fund research and development in the field of cybersecurity.
news.author: David Brown

news.title: Shaw University Students Win Hackathon
news.content: A team of Shaw University students recently won a prestigious hackathon competition, showcasing their skills in software development and problem-solving.
news.author: Jane Doe

news.title: Professor Recognized for Contributions to AI Research
news.content: Dr. Olivia Martinez, a professor in the Computer Science department at Shaw University, has been recognized for her significant contributions to AI research.
news.author: Michael Johnson

news.title: Shaw University Alumni Spotlight: Jordan Brown
news.content: Jordan Brown, a Shaw University alumnus, is making waves in the tech industry with their innovative work in machine learning and data science.
news.author: Jane Doe

news.title: New Research Paper Published by Shaw University Faculty
news.content: Faculty members at Shaw University have published a new research paper on the future of natural language processing.
news.author: Rachel Scott

news.title: Shaw University Students Present Research at Conference
news.content: Students from the Computer Science department at Shaw University recently presented their research at a national conference on software engineering.
news.author: Laura White
